revised_title: On the Contribution of Macroscopic van der Waals Interactions to Frictional Force: A Simplified Approach
tldr: This article explores the frictional force caused by non-retarded van der Waals interactions. The authors develop a simplified method to calculate the force, which is essential for understanding macroscopic interactions and the role of electromagnetic fluctuations in friction. The findings can help improve our understanding of the behavior of materials and their interactions in various applications.
